short indicator description_de: Dieser Indikator misst den Rindfleischkonsum pro Kopf.
short indicator description_en: This indicator measures the beef meat (beinhaltet auch Kalbsfleisch) consumption per capita. Meat consumption is related to living standards, diet, livestock production and consumer prices, as well as macroeconomic uncertainty and shocks to GDP.
long indicator description_de: Dieser Indikator misst den Rindfleischkonsum pro Kopf.
long indicator description_en: Dieser Indikator misst den Rindfleischkonsum (beinhaltet auch Kalbsfleisch) pro Kopf. Fleischkonsum steht in enger Verbindung mit Lebensstandards, Ernährung, Tierbeständen und Produktion tierischer Produkte, Konsumentpreisen sowie makroökonomischer Unsicherheit und Auswirkungen auf das Bruttoinlandsprodukt. Im Vergleich zu anderen Verbrauchsgütern hat Fleisch hohe Produktionskosten. Das hat bedeutende ökologische und gesundheitliche Auswirkungen für den Planeten.
unit: This indicator measures the beef meat (also includes veal) consumption per capita. Meat consumption is related to living standards, diet, livestock production and consumer prices, as well as macroeconomic uncertainty and shocks to GDP. Compared to other commodities, meat is characterised by high production costs and high output prices. This has significant environmental and health consequences for the planet.
explanation of target: Meat consumption is related to living standards, diet, livestock production and consumer prices, as well as macroeconomic uncertainty and shocks to GDP. Compared to other commodities, meat is characterised by high production costs and high output prices. Meat demand is associated with higher incomes and a shift - due to urbanisation - to food consumption changes that favour increased proteins from animal sources in diets. While the global meat industry provides food and a livelihood for billions of people, it also has significant environmental and health consequences for the planet.

quality of indicator: Ok. Es wäre aber besser Daten nicht nur für Rindfleisch zu haben sonder für alle Fleischarten allgemein.
